original_title: Secrets of The Ring w/ Raven Vol. 1
overview: Raven is regarded as one of the best minds in the wrestling business and has been teaching the art of pro wrestling throughout locker rooms for over a decade. In this edition, Raven go into detail on working as a babyface. He covers every aspect of this complex art from selling to body language to transitions to all the little things that should be done in every match. You'll learn how to structure a match and what every babyface always needs to do. While this interview focuses on working as a babyface, Raven talks about many different aspects of working inside the squared circle.
title: Secrets of The Ring w/ Raven Vol. 1
